import React from 'react'; import Image from '../image/index'; import './index.css' function Detail(props) { const { now = {}, setPage, } = props; const weather = now.text?.includes('雨') ? 'rain' : now.text?.includes('雪') ? 'snow' : now.text?.includes('晴') ? 'sun' : now.text?.includes('云') ? 'cloud' : 'overcast'; return (
setPage(1)} />

浙江省, 杭州市

{now.temp || '*'} °c
  • 降水 {now.vis}%
  • 湿度 {now.humidity}%
  • 风速 {now.windSpeed}km/h
); } export default Detail;
